sentences.sentence: All of this AIDS in maintainability and extendibility.
sentences.translation: 所有这些都对可维护性和可扩展性提供了帮助。

sentences.sentence: This brings benefits in consistency and maintainability.
sentences.translation: 这在一致性和维护性方面带来了优点。

sentences.sentence: You can use the QSE framework to improve maintainability.
sentences.translation: 您可以使用QSE框架来提高维护性。
